mapper.select: SELECT EZC_MY_CPN.CPN_CD AS cpnCd /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MY_CPN.USER_ID AS userId /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MY_CPN.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MY_CPN.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_MY_CPN /* MY 쿠폰 정보 */ ,EZC_CPN /* 쿠폰 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MY_CPN.CPN_CD = EZC_CPN.CPN_CD AND EZC_MY_CPN.CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_MY_CPN_PK(P),FK_EZC_CPN_EZC_MY_CPN(R),SYS_C0011507(C) */ AND EZC_MY_CPN.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20), EZC_MY_CPN_PK(P),SYS_C0011508(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_MY_CPN /* MY 쿠폰 정보 */ ,EZC_CPN /* 쿠폰 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MY_CPN.CPN_CD = EZC_CPN.CPN_CD
AND EZC_MY_CPN.CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MY_CPN.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MY_CPN.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MY_CPN.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_MY_CPN.CPN_CD AS cpnCd /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MY_CPN.USER_ID AS userId /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MY_CPN.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MY_CPN.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_MY_CPN /* MY 쿠폰 정보 */ ,EZC_CPN /* 쿠폰 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MY_CPN.CPN_CD = EZC_CPN.CPN_CD
AND EZC_MY_CPN.CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MY_CPN.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MY_CPN.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MY_CPN.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_MY_CPN.CPN_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_MY_CPN SET /* MY 쿠폰 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_MY_CPN /* MY 쿠폰 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
